column3: The  factual  situation  that  must  exist  for  an  Order  to  be  made  under  Section
39(1) does not exist in this application;
The necessity for me to consider whether  the Petitioners have a legal right to
seek a Writ of Mandamus therefore does not arise.

column2: n the above circumstances, I see no legal basis to grant the relief prayed for by the

column1: Petitioners. This application is accordingly dismissed, without costs.
